valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 8 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 9 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Atlantic low expected Wight 968 by midnight tonight. Low west of Bailey 994 expected Bailey 990 by same time. Low German Bight 998 losing its identity
